bibl.title: Earliest Christianity in Egypt. Further Observations.
The World of Early Egyptian Christianity. Language, Literature, and Social Context. Essays in Honor of David W. Johnson
bibl.author: PEARSON, Birger A.

bibl.note: Follows up on: Earliest Christianity in Egypt: Some Observations, The Roots of Egyptian Christianity (Philadelphia, 1986) pp. 132-159. - The Jewish Origins of Egyptian Christianity. - Varieties of Early Egyptian Christianity. - Alexandrian Precursors of Egyptian Monasticism. - Conclusions. - Appendix: The Epistula Apostolorum.
